sentence.Network_en: There was all the usual humbug and obligatory compliments from ministers.
sentence.Network_cn: 全都是些部长们常说的骗人鬼话和少不了的奉承恭维。

sentence.Network_en: What a revolting humbug the man was!
sentence.Network_cn: 那人真是个令人作呕的伪君子！

sentence.Network_en: Britain's laws on homosexuality are hypocritical humbug.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国的同性恋法律都是虚伪的空话连篇。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 时髦的骗子（humbug）——无论是思想上的骗子或人生的骗子——中解放出来，使我们得到勇气。
鬼字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 鬼怪〖 ghostsandmonsters〗 鬼话〖 lie;deception;humbug〗 鬼魂〖 soul;disembodiedspirits〗.
哄字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 哄堂大笑〖 thewholeroomburstingintolaughter〗 哄骗〖 cheat;humbug;deceive〗 哄劝〖 soothe〗.

simply stated , only a fool like Sam will believe this humbug .说得简单些，只有萨姆那样的傻瓜才会相信这种鬼话。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent. (in the senses 'hoax, trick' and 'deceiver'): of unknown origin

entry.tran: 骗人的鬼话;空话;诡计;花招
entry.def: If you describe someone's language or behaviour as humbug, you mean that it is dishonest or insincere.

example.ex: There was all the usual humbug and obligatory compliments from ministers...
example.tran: 全都是些部长们常说的骗人鬼话和少不了的奉承恭维。

example.ex: Britain's laws on homosexuality are hypocritical humbug.
example.tran: 英国的同性恋法律都是虚伪的空话连篇。

entry.def: You can refer to a person as a humbug when you think they are being dishonest, insincere, or pretending to be someone who they are not.

example.ex: What a revolting humbug the man was!
example.tran: 那人真是个令人作呕的伪君子！

entry.def: A humbug is a hard, striped sweet that tastes of peppermint.

means.word_mean: 1. pretentious or silly talk or writing
2. communication (writen or spoken) intended to deceive
3. something intended to deceive; deliberate trickery intended to gain an advantage

auth_sentence.content: The general then announced some humbug of his own.
auth_sentence.res_content: The general then announced some humbug of his own.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The general then announced some humbug of his own.

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, the global currency debate is full of humbug.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, the global currency debate is full of humbug.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, the global currency debate is full of humbug.

auth_sentence.content: Dialectical materialists, unencumbered by any ethical humbug.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dialectical materialists, unencumbered by any ethical humbug.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dialectical materialists, unencumbered by any ethical humbug.

sentences.en: In that way one is sure of accepting no humbug.
Take the humbug out of this world, and you haven’t much left to do business with.
sentences.cn: 把骗子们从这世上轰出去之后，就没剩几个可以跟你来往做生意的了。

sentences.en: to humbug a person into doing sth.
